14:40 Local LLM with Dolly 2.0?

Free Dolly: Introducing the World’s First Open and Commercially Viable Instruction-Tuned LLM - The Databricks Blog

To get the dataset, look for dolly-v2 at the Databricks profile on Hugging Face.

I’ve got a lot of learning to do before any of this makes any kind of sense to me.
